caption.title: Replication kinetics of BgV C-CG (prototype) and BgV T-CG (single mutant NS4A) in C6/36 (28°C), BSR and Vero cells (37°C).
caption.p: The cells were inoculated in triplicates at MOI 0.1 as above, supernatants were harvested at 2, 24, 48, 96 and 120h for C6/36 cells and at 2, 24, 72 and 120 hours p.i. for vertebrate cells, stored at -80°C, titrated on C6/36 cells and the titres determined by fixed-cell ELISA. Error bars represent the standard deviation and the dotted lines represent the lower limit of detection.
Click here for additional data file.
